mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupBoard (courseid, content, writer, `limit`, `date`) VALUES (#{courseid},#{content},#{writer}, #{limit}, #{date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM group WHERE groupid = #{groupid} AND userid LIKE #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `user` as u INNER JOIN `group` as g on u.`userid` = g.`userid` WHERE groupid = ${groupid};
